q: this week, Justin Bieber appeared on The Late Show with David Letterman to promote his film, Never Say Never. Friday night he will be on the show again playing the drums and also reading the Top 10 List, Reasons it's fun to be Justin Bieber . wake of the Tucson tragedy, politicians from both sides of the aisle have called for a more civil discourse in our political debate. On CBS's Face the Nation this morning, John McCain ( R-AZ) said, There is a lack of respect in our dialogue.... We shouldn't mistake passion for advocacy. In other words, passion is necessary in this debate that we're having, but we've got to make sure it doesn't spill over into personal attacks and impugning people's character or patriotism. Eric Schmidt , who has headed up Google since July 2001, sent a message via Twitter Thursday saying: Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! Co-founder Sergey Brin will focus on new products and projects. Google on Thursday also announced fourth quarter net income of$ 2.54 billion, or$ 7.81 a share, up from$ 1.97 billion,
